channel.title: [508] Adjusting Hit Damage (Palidino)
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help...
I don't know where to go, to change the Hit Damage Ratio when fighting an NPC. What I am trying to do, is when attacking an NPC, change the damage that the NPC is given. (Because my source for some reason is ALWAYS 0, I wanted to change it to something more suitable, such as 2 or 3)...
The only probem is, I don't know where o go, and I don't know what methods are used for the damage.
Any help?

item.title: [508] Adjusting Hit Damage (Palidino)
item.dc:creator: @xweetok599 xweetok599
item.description:
@xweetok599 wrote:

I don’t know what code. I can only say NPCHandler.

Read full topic
